event.name: PAVONIAN_PIRATE_ASTEROID
event.text: As you complete the maneuver, you realize that the beacon is located inside the dense asteroid field. A pirate ship, skillfully dodging asteroids, awaits someone to loot: "These are not rainbow aliens." "Doesn't matter, kill them anyway."

event.name: PAVONIAN_PIRATE_SUN
event.text: This beacon is located far from common Pavonian systems, right near a supergiant star. A pirate ship, barely able to withstand the radiating energy, attacks!
